Package etomica.modules.glass2d

Class AccumulatorAutocorrelationPTensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.data.DataProcessor
      • etomica.data.DataProcessorForked
        • etomica.data.DataAccumulator
          • etomica.modules.glass2d.AccumulatorAutocorrelationPTensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataPipe, DataPipeForked, DataSourceIndependent, IDataSink, IDataSource

    public class AccumulatorAutocorrelationPTensor
extends DataAccumulator
implements DataSourceIndependent
    Accumulator designed to compute the unnormalized autocorrelation of the pressure tensor components, assuming that off-diagonal components average to 0. All data is saved and processed when requested. The autocorrelation for each component is computed and then averaged together
